divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife kim was letting our dogs out to use bathroom outback, outside the wooden deck, she noticed a huge bright light, yelled for me, which i was on cpu at this time, i went out back, also saw this huge bright white light, knew it wasn't a star, it suddenly disappeared, only to reappear much closer, as it moved very slow over our house, we kept our eyes on it, until it simply disappeared, just southwest of our house, in pleasantlake, indiana, i told a couple of guys at work, the next day, they laughed, and now that they seen a report on news, they thought of what i had told them, and now are talking about what i told them. thank-you.
